text: And he signed off with a trademark quip! The Duke of Edinburgh attended his last official royal engagement on Wednesday, the Captain General's Parade on the forecourt of Buckingham Palace. In a statement, released to the public, the Palace confirmed : ` ` The Captain General ’ s Parade will bring His Royal Highness ’ s individual program to a conclusion, although he may choose to attend certain events, alongside The Queen, from time to time. ” The event, which marked the finale of the Royal Marines 1664 Global Challenge, was a fitting end to Prince Philip's royal duties. He was first appointed Captain General of the Royal Marines on June 2, 1953, in succession to the late King George VI.
